overview: In part two of this thrilling saga, Bruno and Isabelles fate has only just begun. Isabelle has decided to surrender herself to the millionaire Howard, while Bruno drowns his pain between the legs of anonymous women. Isabelle, accompanied by sexy Julie, signs the contract that will bind her to Howards whims for the next 48 hours. Delighted by his victory, Howard takes her to his luxury residence in Buzios. Isabelle lets the world of indecency and easy sex seize and possess her in all senses. Meanwhile Bruno, completely destroyed, is determined to go in search of Isabelle and win her back.
title: Indecency 2
